wikipedia_page.main:
Paul Shiels is a hurler from County Antrim, Northern Ireland, who plays as a midfielder for the Antrim senior team.Shiels made his first appearance for the team during the 2007 National League and immediately became a regular member of the starting fifteen. Since then he has won four Ulster winners' medal.
At club level Shiels is a two-time Ulster medalist with Dunloy. In addition to this he has also won two county club championship winners' medals.
